mapper.select: SELECT board.board_no as board_no ,board.board_title as board_title ,board_content as board_content ,board.reg_date as reg_date ,board.update_date as update_date ,board.reg_no as reg_no ,member.user_id as reg_id FROM board_board board LEFT JOIN board_member member ON board.reg_no = member.user_no WHERE board.board_no = #{board_no};
